Set #71019 N-POP Girl: And now we come to the final figure to be released as part of the CMF Ninjago series. N-POP Girl is a clear fan of everyone'
column2: s favorite LEGO Movie Unicorn Cat combination... She&#39
column3: s also one of the most colorful residents of NINJAGO City.

column1: N-POP Girl re-uses the tutu element from the Ballerina with some new colours printed on and dual-molded legs which uses a light blue colour for her left boot and a lime green colour for her right boot, this is only the second time I can recall with dual-molded legs where the feet end with different coloured plastics. Her torso is dual-sided with a print of a top that includes Unikitty front and center. She has a single-sided smiling face, a re-use of Harley'
column2: s hair in a mixture of pink and light blue and a pink teddy with printed striped tummy.

d recommend N-POP Girl for her parts, like with most of the characters, but I also recommend her as a solid looking Minifigure from the Series with a great assortment of colours and design elements that come together very nicely. Not jarring or too busy for the eye. Definitely recommended.

column1: N-POP girl is an absolutely ludicrous looking Minifigure who is packed with detail and my favourite of the series .

The figure has the Lego batman movie Harley Quinn hair with a mixture of pink and baby blue , the face looks very happy , the torso features a unikitty face print , the tutu has a mixture of spring green , sand yellow and pink printing and the legs are dual moulded white and spring green and baby blue with stripe printing on the front and sides .
Her accessory is a nice link teddy bear using the standard mould and some printed detail . The stand is the standard black CMF stand .
this is a very highly printed , very fun and crazy Minifigure plus in my opinion the best in the series so recommend it to . .
